txt.en: 'Brigands and outlaws have gone unchecked in Ambarûl for too long. They have now become so brazen that they are preparing to pillage Iridír! Stand by our side and help the Dumûri repel this attack.'
You have helped the Dumûri defend Iridír from pillaging brigands! Return with Khâdamul to discuss your success.
There is no twist in this mission.
The brigands in Ambarûl have become bold and are attacking Iridír.
'Thank you for helping us with the defence of Iridír. I hope the outlaws have learned a lesson they will not soon forget.'
'Your mission is to help the Dumûri defend Iridír.'

Your mission is to help the Dumûri defend Iridír from pillaging brigands. Raise the control point banner when each area has been cleared of attackers.\n\nTalk to Khâdamul when you are ready to defend Iridír.
